circle_bundles
  • API Reference
  • Analysis utilities
  • View page source

Analysis utilities

Local and fiberwise analysis tools.

circle_bundles.fiberwise_clustering

Cluster each fiber with DBSCAN and then merge clusters globally via an overlap graph.

circle_bundles.get_cluster_persistence

Track connected-component count as low-weight edges are removed.

circle_bundles.get_filtered_cluster_graph

Threshold the weighted cluster graph and recompute global components.

circle_bundles.get_local_pca

Compute PCA embeddings separately on each fiber of a cover.

circle_bundles.plot_local_pca

Plot a grid of 2D PCA scatterplots for multiple fibers.

circle_bundles.get_local_rips

Compute Ripser persistence separately on each fiber of a cover.

circle_bundles.plot_local_rips

Plot a grid of persistence diagrams for multiple fibers.

circle_bundles.plot_fiberwise_pca_grid

Plot per-fiber PCA scatter plots colored by DBSCAN cluster labels.

circle_bundles.plot_fiberwise_summary_bars

Plot quick bar-chart summaries of fiberwise clustering and global components.

circle_bundles.get_cocycle_dict

Construct a Z2-valued Čech 1-cocycle dictionary from a fiberwise cluster graph G.

circle_bundles.lift_base_points

Assign consistent signs to representative vectors of points in a double cover (e.g. S^2 -> RP^2).
